text:
Debunking #Myths about #CoVid19 :-

No, Snorting Cocaine or Drinking Alchohol does NOT protect against COVID-19. It’s a highly addictive thing that causes serious side effects and is harmful to people’s health! https://t.co/NJyomvn8x5
